## Features

- üß© Build email templates with Vue components
- üõ§Ô∏è [SSR support](https://vuemail.net/ssr/compiler), preview/send emails both on server and client, now with support for deno and bun.
- üåç [i18n support](https://vuemail.net/plugins/i18n)
- üì® [Integrates with many email providers](https://vuemail.net/integrations/nodemailer)
- üß™ Tested against popular email clients
- üé® [Supports Tailwind CSS](https://vuemail.net/components/tailwind)
- üöö First-class support for Nuxt 3
- ‚ú® Written in TypeScript

## Installation

```bash
# Using npm
npm install vue-email

# Using yarn
yarn add vue-email

# Using pnpm
pnpm add vue-email
```

## üíª Development

1. Clone this repository
2. Enable [Corepack](https://github.com/nodejs/corepack) using `corepack enable`
3. Install dependencies using `pnpm install`
